profilesConfigured.name: Mom and Dad
profilesConfigured.notes: Primary account holder profile — locked, requires 18+ to edit. Cannot be deleted or renamed from kids profile view.

profilesConfigured.name: TestChild7
profilesConfigured.notes: Kids profile. Peacock Kids profiles have 3 maturity tiers: Little Kids (TVY), Older Kids (TVY7/TVG/G), Family (TVPG/PG). No sub-7 age granularity — 'Little Kids' is the lowest.

profilesConfigured.name: TestChild12
profilesConfigured.notes: Kids profile — same maturity as TestChild7. Peacock has no granular age-based kids profiles below 13.

profilesConfigured.name: TestTeen16
profilesConfigured.notes: Teen profile (ages 13-17). Created as new profile — Peacock Kids profiles cannot be converted to Teen/Adult. Teen profiles filter mature (TV-MA) content.

profilesConfigured.name: TestAdult
profilesConfigured.notes: Adult profile (18+). Full content access including TV-MA rated content. Created as new profile after deleting a Kids profile.

pinConfiguration.profilePins: Per-profile PIN toggle available (not enabled on test profiles)
pinConfiguration.viewingRestrictions: Controlled via profile type (Kids/Teen/Adult) and maturity rating tiers
pinConfiguration.notes: Peacock uses per-profile PINs (not account-wide). The 'Mom and Dad' account holder profile is locked by default. Changing maturity ratings and autoplay settings on non-Kids profiles requires account password confirmation.

platformProfileSystem.adultDescription: Adult profiles are for everyone 18+. Full content access.
platformProfileSystem.teenDescription: Teen profiles are for ages 13 to 17. Mature content (TV-MA) is filtered.
platformProfileSystem.kidsDescription: Kids profiles are for ages under 13. Content limited to Family-rated and below.

kidsMaturityTiers.description: Programming is designed to be appropriate for all children.
Programming is designed for children ages 7+. May contain some fantasy violence.
Programming may contain material that parents find unsuitable for younger children.

platformProfileSystem.profileCreationFlow: Avatar selection → Profile type (Adult/Teen/Kids) → Name → Content preferences (skippable)
platformProfileSystem.notes: Profile types are immutable after creation — cannot convert Kids to Teen/Adult or vice versa. Kids profiles cannot access Teen/Adult maturity tiers. Account holder profile ('Mom and Dad') is always locked and requires 18+ to edit. Password confirmation required to change maturity ratings or autoplay on Adult profiles.

preTestChecklist.notes: Fresh profiles — no watch history. Autoplay disabled on all test profiles. Profile PINs not enabled on test profiles (available per-profile). Content availability needs verification.

platformDiscoveries.passwordRequiredForChanges: Changing maturity rating or autoplay settings on Adult/Teen profiles requires account password entry
platformDiscoveries.profileTypeImmutable: Profile types (Adult/Teen/Kids) cannot be changed after creation — must delete and recreate
platformDiscoveries.kidsMaturityLimited: Kids profiles only have 3 maturity tiers (Little Kids/Older Kids/Family) — no Teen/Adult content access
platformDiscoveries.lockedAccountProfile: Account holder profile ('Mom and Dad') is locked and shows 'You must be 18+ years old to edit' on the profiles page
platformDiscoveries.reactControlledInputs: Profile name inputs are React-controlled — requires double-click + Cmd+A + type_text pattern for replacement (fill() appends instead of replacing)
